reviewText: A most interesting informative and engaging DVD all about Florida. People young and old love watching this. So happy I bought it. I've watched it several times and shared it with others!

Poor video quality.  Obviously filmed in backyard with traffic in background.  Nice story. Fantastic author.  "A Time Remembered" was an excellent book. I wish he had talked more about it in the video.  Very sorry that Patrick Smith is no longer with us.

Loved this DVD! A wonderful look into old time Florida or as Smith said, the last frontier. If you love history and Florida, you will enjoy this. He also gives excellent insight into how he became Florida's most beloved author.
I am glad I ought this book.
